messages.title: Welcome to Integration Manager System Messages
messages.content:
This new feature allows you to receive important announcements and updates about the Integration Manager.

Messages are marked as read automatically when you view this page.

messages.title: Orphaned Entities Diagnostics Available
messages.content:
A new Diagnostics page has been added to help identify orphaned entities in your activities.

Orphaned entities can prevent activities from functioning properly. Visit the Diagnostics page to see if any activities need attention.

messages.title: Notification Settings Enhanced
messages.content:
You can now receive notifications for:

  • Integration updates
  • New integrations detected
  • Integration errors
  • Orphaned entities in activities

Configure your preferences in the Notifications settings page.
